content: Did I just delete the event for everyone by accident? I meant to just remove one of my accounts for my fastly one...
I think I did... I'll rectify this tomorrow, sorry about that!
Yes, it is gone now, and we had just gotten it moved to the correct time.
@Alex Crichton This is why I use my personal email for everything done in public, even if it's work-related.
I had to switch a bunch of things tied to an old ISP email once, and decided then that I never wanted to switch email addresses again. :)
ok I think I fixed it, although it looks lik it resent an invite to everyone?
